name: search-client
description: Javascript library for executing searches in the IntelliSearch search-index via the SearchService REST interface.

scripts.lint: echo. && echo *** Linting... && yarn run tslint -- src/*.ts && echo Lint success.
scripts.build: echo. && echo *** Building... && yarn run rimraf -- dist && yarn run tsc && yarn run simplifyify -- --bundle --debug --minify --test --outfile dist/SearchClient.bundle.js dist/SearchClient.js && echo *** Build success.
scripts.test: echo. && echo *** Test not implemented yet!
scripts.doc: echo. && echo *** Documenting... && yarn run rimraf -- doc && yarn run typedoc -- ./src/ --exclude node_modules --ignoreCompilerErrors --mode file --experimentalDecorators --target ES6 --out ./doc/ && echo *** Documentation created: doc/index.html
scripts.prepack: yarn run test && yarn run doc && echo *** Pre-release success. && echo - If ready to release, commit changes and then 'yarn run release'. && echo - Note that commit comment should follow standard-version comment convention https://github.com/bcoe/conventional-changelog-standard/blob/master/convention.md
scripts.pack: echo. && echo *** Packing... && yarn run standard-version && yarn pack && echo Pack success. && echo - Release notes created and committed. && echo - Package created. && echo - Remember to git-push commits and tags to the git-origin! && echo - Run 'npm publish' to publish the package to the npmjs repository.

author: Ronny Hanssen <ronny@intellisearch.com> (http://intellisearch.com/)
